ch.ethz.inspire.emod.simulation

Class GeometricKienzleSimulationControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.simulation.ASimulationControl
      • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.simulation.GeometricKienzleSimulationControl

  • public class GeometricKienzleSimulationControl
extends ASimulationControl
    Simulation control class for moments based on the kienzle approximation.
    Author:
    dhampl

      Set the input parameters (n,ap,d,...) of the Kienzle simulator.
      void setSimulationPeriod(double periodLength)
      sets the simulation period length in seconds. if required, samples are re- sampled to the given rate.
      void setState(MachineState state)
      sets and maps the MachineState to the appropriate SimulationState
      void update()
      updates the simulationOutput IOContainer according to the SimulationState and simulation logic for the next simulation cycle.

      • GeometricKienzleSimulationControl

        public GeometricKienzleSimulationControl(java.lang.String name,
                                 double[] n,
                                 double[] f,
                                 double[] ap,
                                 double[] d)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        only SI values.
        length of all arrays must be the same.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the simulation control object
        configFile - config values like state mapping, kappa, kc, z
        n - spindle revolutions [1/s]
        f - feed [m/U]
        ap - depth of cut [m]
        d - diameter [m]
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • installKienzleInputParameters

        public void installKienzleInputParameters(Process process)
        Set the input parameters (n,ap,d,...) of the Kienzle simulator. The parameter are read and processed and a time series containing the torque is generated.
        Parameters:
        process - Process object containing all process parameters.
